page.title: 11Stockland and Otterhampton.
page.content: {Stockland}is a small village near Combwich,where there are 37 houses,4 farms and 1 church.There are about 108 people in Stockland.There are a lot of fields.Most of them are grass, for grazing and hay.Cereal crops are also grown.Stockland church was built in 1867,but there was a church on the same site in 1310.The old vicarage is now an old peoples home.Mrs.Foyle has 10 chickens,5 goats and a hive of bees.She makes 20 pounds of honey a year.Also there is a furniture maker in Stockland.There are no shops in Stockland.The Post Office closed down about a year ago.The nearest shops are 3 miles away in Combwich,so is the school. {Otterhampton}is a small hamlet next to Stockland.It has 14 houses,1 church and 1 farm.There are about 28 people in Otterhampton.
